Package com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FillableInventoryAction  
    MenuAction
    Specifies an action for the menu to perform on click.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BootFromPartyAction
    Boots a player from a party
    ChangeSpellHolderAction  
    ChangeTitleAction  
    ChargeAction
    An action that must charge for a while, and then happens
    CraftServiceAction
    Takes a list of requirements and a fee and produces results
    CreateImbuementAction
    Takes items (presumably from the imbuement table menu) and makes them into an imbuement, and registers such to the player
    ForgeAction
    Repairs a player's equipment
    ImbueAction  
    InnAction
    Rests a player, restoring health and hunger
    JoinPartyAction
    Adds a player to another player's party, creating it if it doesn't exist
    LevelupHealthAction
    Levels up a player, awarding them some amount of health
    LevelupManaAction
    Levels up a player, awarding them some amount of mana
    OfferServiceAction
    Trades an itemstack for some currency
    OpenInventoryAction
    Opens a simple inventory.
    OpenInventoryGuiAction  
    PartyInviteAction  
    PurchaseAction
    The action of purchasing an item or service from an NPC.
    PurchaseSpellAction
    The action of purchasing an item or service from an NPC.
    QuestStartAction  
    ShowChatMenuAction
    Actions that causes a chat menu to be shown to a player
    ShowSkillMenuAction  
    ShowSkillRecipesAction  
    TeleportAction
    Ferries a player
    TogglePlayerOptionAction
    Toggles a specific player option
